com.tranek.chivalryserverbrowser

Class FriendQuery.Synchronizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tranek.chivalryserverbrowser.FriendQuery.Synchronizer
  • Enclosing class:
    FriendQuery

    public class FriendQuery.Synchronizer
extends java.lang.Object
    Synchronizes access to shared data between the threads that query the user's Steam friends.
